description: Creates an AWS Chatbot confugration for Slack.

parameters.name: SlackTeamId
parameters.description: The ID of the Slack workspace authorized with AWS Chatbot.

parameters.name: SlackChannelId
parameters.description: The ID of the Slack channel. To get this ID, open Slack, right click on the channel name in the left pane, then choose Copy Link. The channel ID is the 9-character string at the end of the URL. For example, ABCBBLZZZ.

parameters.name: SnsTopicArns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the SNS topics that deliver notifications to AWS Chatbot. (string) ---

parameters.name: IamRoleArn
parameters.description: A user-defined role that AWS Chatbot assumes. This is not the service-linked role. For more information, see IAM policies for AWS Chatbot in the AWS Chatbot Administrator Guide.

parameters.name: GuardrailPolicyArns
parameters.description: The list of IAM policy ARNs that are applied as channel guardrails. The AWS managed AdministratorAccess policy is applied by default if this is not set. (string) ---

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A map of tags assigned to a resource. A tag is a string-to-string map of key-value pairs. (dict) --- A key-value pair. A tag consists of a tag key and a tag value. Tag keys and tag values are both required, but tag values can be empty (null) strings. For more information, see User-Defined Tag Restrictions in the AWS Billing and Cost Management User Guide. The key of the tag. The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: ChannelConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for a Slack channel configured with AWS Chatbot.

nested_items.name: SlackTeamId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Slack workspace authorized with Amazon Chime.

nested_items.name: SlackChannelId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Slack channel.

nested_items.name: SlackChannelName
nested_items.description: The name of the Slack channel.

nested_items.name: ChatConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SlackChannelConfiguration.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: A user-defined role that AWS Chatbot assumes. This is not the service-linked role.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicArns
nested_items.description: The ARNs of the SNS topics that deliver notifications to AWS Chatbot.

nested_items.name: LoggingLevel
nested_items.description: Logging levels include ERROR, INFO, or NONE.

nested_items.name: GuardrailPolicyArns
nested_items.description: The list of IAM policy ARNs that are applied as channel guardrails. The AWS managed AdministratorAccess policy is applied by default if this is not set.

nested_items.name: UserAuthorizationRequired
nested_items.description: Enables use of a user role requirement in your chat configuration.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A map of tags assigned to a resource. A tag is a string-to-string map of key-value pairs.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Either ENABLED or DISABLED. The resource returns DISABLED if the organization's AWS Chatbot policy has explicitly denied that configuration. For example, if Amazon Chime is disabled.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: Provided if State is DISABLED. Provides context as to why the resource is disabled.
